title: Adventures of Captain Africa: mighty jungle avenger. Vol. 1
creator_credit: Columbia Pictures, Sam Katzman and Spencer Bennet
brief_description: Captain Africa helps the Arabian caliph Hamid to regain his throne which has been stolen from him by a rival. Aided by adventurer Ted Arnold, hunter Nat Coleman, his assistant Omar and Arabian princess Rhoda, Captain Africa battles wild animals, the usurper’s army and a pair of white adventurers. For some reason this movie serial was banned in Finland.
